text: Deryck Whibley (born March 21, 1980) is a Canadian singer and musician from the band Sum 41. He was married to Avril Lavigne but on October 9, 2009, Lavigne filed for divorce. == References == Category:1980 births Category:Living people Category:Canadian singers Category:Canadian guitarists Category:Sum 41 Category:Musicians from Ontario
title: Deryck Whibley
